name: Cocoa-Catastrope
description:
THANKS TO THE TIRELESS WORK OF OUR ARMY OF FLAVOUR SCIENTISTS, CHOCOCORP IS FINALLY PLEASED TO PRESENT TO YOU THE CHOCOCORP PATENTED FLAVOUR FRIEND™, A SENTIENT SNACK FOR BETWEEN THE MEALS, MADE FROM FAIR TRADE CACAO AND THE SAME CONSCIOUSNESS THAT LEAD PHILOSOPHERS TO THEORISE THE EXISTENCE OF A SOUL.

Also, our CEO will be delivering a press conference at 2pm, don't miss it...
